name: For The Beard!
description:
To Play:

Unzip the file and double click the .exe file.

Controls: Mouse

Rules:

  • click and drag cards from the hand to the area next to the deck to cast that spell
  • click on the deck and choose draw to draw cards (drawing cards takes mana)
